mapper.select: select w.welfareid, d.departmentId,d.departmentName,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME,w.welfare_type,w.issue_date,w.welfare_monery,w.tax,w.goods,w.remark from welfare w left join department d on w.departmentId=d.departmentId left join staff_info s on w.staff_id=s.staff_id
select d.departmentId,d.departmentName,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME from staff_info s left join department d on s.departmentId=d.departmentId

select d.departmentId,d.departmentName,s.staff_id,s.STAFF_NAME,w.welfare_type,w.issue_date,w.welfare_monery,w.tax,w.goods,w.remark from welfare w left join department d on w.departmentId=d.departmentId left join staff_info s on w.staff_id=s.staff_id where w.welfareid=#{id}
